title: Salesforce abandons pursuit of Informatica
description: Salesforce ends Informatica acquisition talks over terms disagreement. Deal could've been significant. Informatica's stock price at $35.19. Salesforce known for strategic acquisitions like Tableau and Slack.
content: Business software maker Salesforce has backed away from its talks to acquire data-management software firm Informatica after the two companies could not agree on terms, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Sunday.
cleaned_content: business software maker salesforce has backed away from its talks to acquire data management software firm informatica after the two companies could not agree on terms a person familiar with the matter told reuters on sunday
